entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:22 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 04:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -38.5°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -42.3°C
Wind: N 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
